title: The Karate kid. Part 2
creator_credit: John G. Avildsen and Jerry Weintraub
brief_description: Karate kid, Daniel travels to Japan with his teacher, Miyagi, to visit Miyagi’s dying father. It’s a troubled trip for Daniel and his teacher as Miyagi returns to face his sworn enemy. Daniel becomes involved in the hate-ridden vendetta and whereas before he fought in a contest where a trophy was at stake, Daniel now plays a game that’s a fight to the death.
